pullRequest.title: Core - enrichedResource
pullRequest.bodyText:
In the old implementation, there was no way how to retrieve resource
objects with theirs attributes. Therefore, a new EnrichedResource
object has been created.
Created methods getEnrichedResourceById,
getEnrichedResourcesForFacility and
getEnrichedResourcesForVo.

nodes.bodyText: This is not the right place for filtering. On the business logic layer, you need to get always all objects you could have. Filtrations need to be done on entry layer.
